name: Of Wolf and Mom
description:
Description

The villagers have invaded the abandoned castle and now the werewolf must escape from it. However, it can't left it's baby behind. Now Mamma Werewolf must elude the villagers at the same time it takes care of it's baby!

Controls

Arrows - Move
Z - Jump
X - Attack
C - Drop/Pickup Baby

Version History

1.0 - Ludum Dare 46 Release
